languages.text: {n}В голову закрадывается мысль, — вы уверены, что вам она не принадлежит, — но все же отдается по телу страстным желанием обладать. Мысль, манящая и отталкивающая: вам нужно принести ее камень души в дар Той, Что Жаждет.{/n}

{n}A thought surfaces in your mind, one that clearly does not belong to you, yet your body reacts to it with a burning possessive desire. A thought that is both alluring and revolting: you must offer her spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В голову закрадывается мысль, — вы уверены, что вам она не принадлежит, — но все же отдается по телу страстным желанием обладать. Мысль, манящая и отталкивающая: вам нужно принести ее камень души в дар Той, Что Жаждет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A thought appears in your head — one that surely does not belong to you — and your body aches with the burning possessive desire. A thought both alluring and revolting: you had to bring the spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

{n}A thought appears in your head — one that surely does not belong to you — and your body aches with the burning possessive desire. A thought both alluring and revolting: you had to bring the spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

{n}A thought appears in your head — one that surely does not belong to you — and your body aches with the burning possessive desire. A thought both alluring and revolting: you have to bring the spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

{n}A thought appears in your head — one that surely does not belong to you — and your body aches with the burning possessive desire. A thought both alluring and revolting: you have to bring the spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

{n}A thought surfaces in your mind, one that clearly does not belong to you, yet your body reacts to it with a burning possessive desire. A thought that is both alluring and revolting: you must offer her spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

{n}A thought surfaces in your mind, one that clearly does not belong to you, yet your body reacts to it with a burning possessive desire. A thought that is both alluring and revolting: you must offer her spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una idea te invade la mente, una que desde luego no se ha formado en ella, y tu cuerpo reacciona con un anhelo posesivo y ardiente. La idea es tan tentadora como repulsiva: llevarle su joya espiritual a la Sedienta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thought surfaces in your mind, one that clearly does not belong to you, yet your body reacts to it with a burning possessive desire. A thought that is both alluring and revolting: you must offer her spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una idea te invade la mente (porque desde luego no se ha formado en ella), y un ardiente anhelo se apodera de tu cuerpo. Se trata de una idea tan tentadora como repulsiva: tienes que llevarle su joya espiritual a la Sedienta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的意识中突然浮现出了一个想法，你很确信这个想法不是你自己的，因为你的身体正被强烈的占有欲所刺痛。这个想法既诱人，又令人恶心——你必须把她的灵魂石献给饥渴女士。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thought surfaces in your mind, one that clearly does not belong to you, yet your body reacts to it with a burning possessive desire. A thought that is both alluring and revolting: you must offer her spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的脑海中突然冒出了一个想法，你很确信这个想法不是你自己的，因为你的身体正被强烈的占有欲所刺痛。这个想法既诱人，又令人恶心——你必须把她的灵魂石献给饥渴女士。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une pensée vous vient alors à l'esprit, mais elle n'est pas de vous. Votre corps est pris d'un désir soudain, d'une envie aussi attirante que repoussante : vous devez à tout prix offrir la pierre-esprit d'Yrliet à l'Assoiffée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thought surfaces in your mind, one that clearly does not belong to you, yet your body reacts to it with a burning possessive desire. A thought that is both alluring and revolting: you must offer her spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une pensée vous vient alors à l'esprit, mais elle n'est pas de vous. Votre corps est pris d'un désir soudain, d'une envie aussi attirante que repoussante : vous devez à tout prix offrir la pierre-esprit d'Yrliet à l'Assoiffée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの頭の中にある考えが浮かぶ。それは、きっと自分のものではない…そして、あなたの肉体は燃えるような所有欲で痛みを叫ぶ。それは魅惑的で反吐が出るような考えだ。「〈かの渇きたる女〉に魂縛石を届けなければならない」と。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thought surfaces in your mind, one that clearly does not belong to you, yet your body reacts to it with a burning possessive desire. A thought that is both alluring and revolting: you must offer her spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの頭の中にある考えが浮かぶ。それは、きっと自分のものではない…そして、あなたの肉体は燃えるような所有欲で痛みを叫ぶ。それは魅惑的で反吐が出るような考えだ。「〈かの渇きたる女〉に魂縛石を届けなければならない」と。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Gedanke erscheint in deinem Verstand. Ein Gedanke, der offensichtlich nicht der deine ist, und doch reagiert dein Körper mit einem brennenden, gierigen Verlangen darauf. Es ist ein Gedanke, der ebenso verlockend wie verstörend ist: Du musst ihren Seelenstein zu Ihr, die dürstet, bringen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thought surfaces in your mind, one that clearly does not belong to you, yet your body reacts to it with a burning possessive desire. A thought that is both alluring and revolting: you must offer her spirit stone to She Who Thirsts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Gedanke erscheint in deinem Kopf. Ein Gedanke, der ganz gewiss nicht dir gehört. Eine Begierde ergreift Besitz von dir, dass dein ganzer Körper brennt. Es ist ein Gedanke, der ebenso verlockend wie verstörend ist: Du musst den Seelenstein zu Ihr, die dürstet, bringen.{/n}
